snippet.title: Finally A NSMB2 Christmas Mod - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Surprise!!! I hope you have fun playing the mod! In just a few days time something else might be on the way as well..

Download:
https://mega.nz/file/vYt2EBgA#8Nn1LJ7q-v2VEueuavITc53N0Dylk89D7MeSWrRj5lM
You can also find it on GameBanana:
https://gamebanana.com/mods/563455

This 1 world mod includes:

~ Brand New Levels with a Christmas theme!
~ Brand new and familiar festive graphics!
~ Tons of remodeled enemies and objects to fit the Christmas theme!
~ Custom Snow themed Worldmap!
~ A Soundtrack made up of many game franchises!
~ And much much more!!!

Merry Christmas and a Happy Holidays!!! 
Hope you have a great day and enjoy the mod!!!

Music used in the trailer can be found here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PxjqQMzLU6g
